entry.title: How to linearize your cluster
entry.summary: The discussion has been shifted to a new topic focusing on cluster mempool partitioning attacks within Bitcoin's network to avoid cluttering the current conversation thread and to highlight its significance as an independent subject of interest. Interested parties can engage in this specific dialogue by visiting the provided [link](https://delvingbitcoin.org/t/cluster-mempool-partitioning-attacks/1548?u=stefanwouldgo). This move ensures that the conversation remains organized and accessible to those who are specifically interested in the technical details and implications of such attacks on the Bitcoin network.
